TopicTitle: A New Challenger Has Entered The Arena!

Articles.Content:
Hi everyone, Dan\'s the name, joined to support the project and follow development. I think the game is fantastic and very unique and will definitely pre order the full game when payday comes as the demo is grand Look forward to seeing you guys around the forum.

Dan

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky
